Class AbstractEmailServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.developersboard.backend.service.mail.impl.AbstractEmailServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:

public abstract class AbstractEmailServiceImpl extends Object implements EmailService
This abstract class leverages the required methods by the EmailService.
